questions-hard.question: What is the estimated mass-energy composition of the universe?
options: 27% dark matter, 68% dark energy, 5% ordinary matter
50% dark energy, 30% dark matter, 20% ordinary matter
80% dark matter, 10% dark energy, 10% ordinary matter

options: Same as the speed of light
